name: notes-app-fullstack
description: Full-stack notes application with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting both frontend and backend...' && npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Your Name
